Summary: Large black triangle shaped craft, no sound, five lights.
divs: sighting detailsi encountered one of these triangular shaped ships while i was stationed at soto cano airforce base in honduras in 1998. i was part of a marine unit that was down there providing hurricane relief after hurricane mitch hit the country. it was amazing and i never would have seen it if i had not been lying down on a picnic table looking up at the stars while i was on base. it flew low about 200 feet off the ground and made absolutely no noise and it went right over me at a speed of about 40 mph. i knew immediately that it was a ufo. i didn't bother telling anyone because i didn't feel anyone would believe me. it's interesting to know that there have been similar sightings around the world. the only lights that this ufo had were 5 white lights. one light at each corner, and two lights in the middle at the edge of each side, i did not see any red light in the center. it was hard to judge the size of this ship. the one you have in your photo for this story looks a little different from what i witnessed. this was a complete isoceles triangle and there were no curves in the sides. the 5 lights were much smaller, about 1\4 the size of the ones in your photo and not as bright. there was a very bright moon that night which made it very easy to observe it's shape. i watched it as long as i could until it went out of my sight. that memory has always stuck with me and i'm glad that i was able to witness one of these crafts.
